text: HK Kryzhynka Kyiv () was an ice hockey team in Kyiv, Ukraine. The team played in the Ukrainian Hockey League, the top level of Ukrainian ice hockey. They were founded in 1991. Name changes * from 1991 to 1999: Kryzhynka Kyiv * from 1999 to 1999: Irbis Kyiv ==Achievements== * Silver 1996–97 Ukrainian Hockey Championship ==References== ==External links== *Team profile on eurohockey.com Category:Ice hockey teams in Ukraine Category:Sport in Kyiv
title: HK Kryzhynka Kyiv
